name: UnityCore
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
What is the project about?
UnityCore Protocol is a decentralized lending protocol built on Core chain.
It is a protocol built on love to unify the entire core ecosystem.
It is a protocol where core users can participate as lenders and borrowers.
We aim to offer a transparent, and open-source financial service environment.

What makes your project unique?
Building on Core Chain makes it unique 


History of your project.
A story behind the project is a CEO that has a burden to build a lending protocol that will counter the fake and unreliable lending module that has already been in existence


What’s next for your project?
Bringing the testnet to live in few days time 


What can your token be used for?
Staking, and as borrowing asset.
